SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - South Korean President Moon Jae - in said Sunday that [ARG0: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: committed] [ARGM-LOC: in their surprise meeting] [ARG1: to sitting down with President Donald Trump and to a " complete denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula] . "

SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - South Korean President Moon Jae - in said Sunday that [ARG1: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] committed in their surprise meeting to [V: sitting] down [ARG2: with President Donald Trump] and to a " complete denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula . "
